backend/main.mo: Defines data models, storage maps, settings, and authorized CRUD endpoints for users, leads, outreach, deals, services, projects, and client service requests.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config setting CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and layout for all major application pages including public proposal sharing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyS: Empty placeholder file for an admin-only UI section component.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientServ: Empty placeholder file for an admin panel for client service requests.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for authenticated users to complete profile setup with prefill and registration logic.
frontend/src/components/common/BlockedSt: Reusable card component displaying blocked-state messages with optional navigation action.
frontend/src/components/common/ChartBloc: Reusable chart container with title, optional actions, and content area.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error card showing an error message with optional retry button.
Displays a lead's details in a card with status color, revenue potential, and owner info.
frontend/src/components/common/ProgressB: Renders a progress bar with optional label and percentage or value display.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Image component that shows a fallback or initials when loading fails, with loading placeholder handling.
frontend/src/components/common/StatsCard: Shows a metric card with title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and trend indicator.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealCard.t: Displays basic deal info including value, lead name, and creation date in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealDialog: Modal for creating or editing deals with form fields, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDat: Provides export options for app data in PDF, DOCX, CSV, and Excel formats with download handling.
Main layout wrapper with mobile-friendly header, sidebar navigation, and content area.
frontend/src/components/leads/AddLeadDia: Modal form for creating new leads with validation and submission to backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/leads/ImportLead: Dialog to upload a CSV, parse leads, handle import, and show success or error results.
frontend/src/components/leads/LeadDetail: Displays lead details and allows updating lead status with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/nav/FollowUpBadg: Shows a bell icon and placeholder logic for follow‑ups due today using lead data.
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Renders sidebar navigation with route links, branding, and session‑clearing functionality.
frontend/src/components/outreach/StartOu: Form dialog to create an outreach activity for a lead, including message and follow‑up scheduling.
frontend/src/components/planner/PlannerP: Displays planner progress stats and daily tasks with streaks, completion percentages, and dates.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays project details with editable notes and attachments, supporting updates via mutation.
Form dialog for creating or editing a project, handling service/client selection and saving via mutations.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Form dialog for adding or editing a service, validating required fields and submitting via API.
frontend/src/components/uploads/Attachme: Renders a list of uploaded attachments with preview, download, and optional removal actions.
Handles file selection, validation, upload progress, and returns uploaded blobs to parent components.
frontend/src/constants/uploadedImages.ts: Defines centralized URLs for uploaded static image assets using a helper for correct public paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgencyAnalytics.ts: Fetches and returns complete agency analytics data via react-query, falling back to empty arrays on missing actor or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRole.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and admin status with safe fallbacks for guest users.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Manages creating and fetching client service requests, with query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves, saves, and registers user profiles with normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeals.ts: Handles fetching user deals and updating or creating deals with related cache invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportData.ts: Exports all lead, outreach, service, deal, and project data using multiple backend export calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches all leads and supports adding, updating, and importing leads with cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreach.ts: Retrieves outreach activities and supports adding or optimistically updating activity status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanner.ts: Simulates in-memory planner plan creation and task updates tied to the current user.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Fetches, adds, updates, and completes projects filtered by the user’s agency with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and seeding services via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and utility classes for layout, typography, and components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays agency analytics with metrics and charts derived from leads, deals, outreach, and services data.
Empty placeholder page for client onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with key metrics, charts, funnel data, and onboarding UI for new users.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Shows deals grouped by status with totals, and provides dialogs for viewing and creating deals.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Lists leads with search and filtering, and includes dialogs for adding, importing, and viewing lead details.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Renders a multi-platform outreach tracker with tabs, status updates, and dialog to start outreach. Fetches outreach activities and leads, allowing marking messages as sent or replied.
frontend/src/pages/PlannerPage.tsx: Displays a 30‑day outreach planner and lets users generate a new plan. Shows loading state, existing plan view, or CTA cards to start planning.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists projects with service and client info, progress indicators, and dialogs for creating or viewing project details. Supports loading state and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalSharePage.tsx: Shows a placeholder proposal viewer based on a proposal ID from the URL. Indicates that full proposal viewing will be added later.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Manages services with activation toggles, edit/add dialogs, and optional service catalog seeding. Fetches services, handles status updates, and supports auto-seeding.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPricingPage.t: Displays predefined pricing categories with tiers and features using tabs and accordions. Provides static service pricing data with UI components for browsing.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing users or guests to view and edit profile info and save updates.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Optional sign‑in page that collects an identifier and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/types/docx.d.ts: Type declarations for the docx library, defining classes and enums for Word document creation.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Type definitions for jspdf-autotable, describing table configuration and styles for PDF generation.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Type declarations for jsPDF, including constructor options, text APIs, and output methods.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type definitions for xlsx utilities for reading, writing, and converting spreadsheet data.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin allowlist logic.
frontend/src/utils/assets/publicAssetUrl: Utility that builds base‑path‑aware URLs for public assets in different deployment contexts.
frontend/src/utils/export/download.ts: Helper that triggers browser downloads by creating temporary object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportCsv.ts: Generates CSV export sections for leads, outreach, services, deals, and projects.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportDocx.ts: Produces an RTF‑based DOCX-compatible export containing all data sections.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportPdf.ts: Generates a print‑friendly HTML document for PDF export of all data sections.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportSchema.t: Defines export field schemas for various data types and a helper to format field values.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportXlsx.ts: Generates minimal XML-based XLSX files using export schemas and spreadsheet XML.
frontend/src/utils/export/filename.ts: Creates timestamped filenames and formatted timestamps for exports.
frontend/src/utils/leads/csv.ts: Parses CSV text into Lead objects with validation and error collection.
Provides a predefined catalog of services with names, types, prices, and delivery times.
frontend/src/utils/signInIdentifier.ts: Handles storing, classifying, normalizing, and comparing email/phone sign-in identifiers.
frontend/src/utils/uploads/fileValidatio: Validates uploaded files by size, extension, and MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current Bubble app state, including removed authentication gates, core data models, architectural notes, and known issues. Includes existing features and highlights multi‑tenant logic, onboarding flows, and integration requirements.
